name: 1 - Confirm Stormwater alignment is as per latest Drawing revision and does not clash with other Services.
Comments: Design Engineer to approve if the location needs to be moved.
2 - Check Survey Set out and mark out completed.
3 - Confirm correct location of Manholes or Chambers, Catchpits.
5 - Pothole existing services data in place.
Comments: Trench depth > 1.5m must be shored or battered.
STORMWATER PIPE INSTALLATION, BACKFILL AND TESTING
9 - Check actual horizontal and vertical alignment achieved
10 - Ensure pipe is checked & cleaned before being laid into the trench.
Comments: No vandalism, surface damage or deterioration. No install if found defective.
11 - Line, level, and grade conformance checked
12 - Ensure Bedding, surround & backfill materials are well-compacted and tested.
13 - Ensure installed pipeline has CCTV completed
Comments: No internal surface cracks. Clean from debris and contaminants.
